toolkit.web

Class ToolkitController

  • java.lang.Object
    • toolkit.web.ToolkitController

  • @SessionAttributes(value={"userParameters","contiglist","discardedcontigcount","gcResult","orfResult","contiguousread"})
 @Controller
public class ToolkitController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by James Euesden on 01/03/2016. The controller class for the web service of the toolkit application. Handles incoming requests and what is expected within a users session in order to progress. Using @SessionAttributes allows the application to also know whether a user has permission to be on a particular page or not. For example, if a user tries to skip to the 'toolkit' results page without having submitted any data, they will be presented with the error page, as they do not have any @SessionAttributes of submitted data.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String dataResult(UserParameters userParameters, ContiguousRead contig, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the inspection results on an individual ContiguousRead, as selected from the '/list' view, and now carried in the users @SessionAttributes.
      java.lang.String index(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Returns the welcome page to the user, setting up some blank @SessionAttributes to be carried with them for the duration of their session and populated as they progress through the toolkit.
      java.lang.String readUserInput(UserParameters userParameters, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Upon submission of the users data on the 'welcome' page, a POST request is made to /list, that calls to this method where the data is used to create a list of ContiguousReads that can be displayed back to the user, after removing any that fall under their requested threshold.
      java.lang.String viewPreviousUserInput(UserParameters userParameters, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      On a GET to the list of contiguous reads, a user may expect to see any current contiguous reads in the list from their session, as they are assumed to have already submitted data and hit the POST endpoint first and then left that page and are now returning to see the data they have in their session.

    • Method Detail

      • index

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String index(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Returns the welcome page to the user, setting up some blank @SessionAttributes to be carried with them for the duration of their session and populated as they progress through the toolkit.
        Parameters:
        model - The Model attribute, carrying the users data as they browse the web service.
        Returns:
        The page to be returned, where the String matches a template file in the resources directory.

      • viewPreviousUserInput

        @RequestMapping(value="/list",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String viewPreviousUserInput(@ModelAttribute(value="userParameters")
                                                                                                           UserParameters userParameters,
                                                                                                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        On a GET to the list of contiguous reads, a user may expect to see any current contiguous reads in the list from their session, as they are assumed to have already submitted data and hit the POST endpoint first and then left that page and are now returning to see the data they have in their session.
        Parameters:
        userParameters - The user parameters in their session.
        model - The Model attribute, carrying the users data as they browse the web service.
        Returns:
        The page to be returned, where the String matches a template file in the resources directory.

      • readUserInput

        @RequestMapping(value="/list",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String readUserInput(UserParameters userParameters,
                                                                                                    org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Upon submission of the users data on the 'welcome' page, a POST request is made to /list, that calls to this method where the data is used to create a list of ContiguousReads that can be displayed back to the user, after removing any that fall under their requested threshold.
        Parameters:
        userParameters - The user parameters in their session.
        model - The Model attribute, carrying the users data as they browse the web service.
        Returns:
        The page to be returned, where the String matches a template file in the resources directory.

      • dataResult

        @RequestMapping(value="/result",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String dataResult(@ModelAttribute(value="userParameters")
                                                                                                   UserParameters userParameters,
                                                                                                   @ModelAttribute(value="contiguousread")
                                                                                                   ContiguousRead contig,
                                                                                                   org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Displays the inspection results on an individual ContiguousRead, as selected from the '/list' view, and now carried in the users @SessionAttributes. When the POST to this /result page is made, the inspection is carried out by the application and then the results are added to the Model to be used by Thymeleaf in displaying as part of the View.
        Parameters:
        userParameters - The user parameters in their session.
        contig - The ContiguousRead that the user wishes to inspect further and have the application process.
        model - The Model attribute, carrying the users data as they browse the web service.
        Returns:
        The page to be returned, where the String matches a template file in the resources directory.
